name: Disco Make You Lose Control
description:
Welcome to Disco Make You Lose Control!

The objective of the game is to stay calm, use the resources provided, and kill the the zombie overlord DJ, and save the party!

The game has no actual end, but beating the boss is considered endgame. 

CONTROLS:

Movement: W A S D

Shooting: Left Click

(Use power ups by making contact with them)

Credits:

Developer / Sound Effects: Dante T.

Artist: Zachary S.

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
